name: European Chamber of Commerce and Industry in Lao PDR
memberOrga: More than 100 corporate members as well as three embassies and 1 EU representation. Details are available under https://eccil.org/business/.
goal:
ECCIL's objective is to strengthen the position of the European business community in Laos by
- providing high quality information and services
- promoting members' interests
- promoting Laos as a place to do business
- cooperating with other chambers on a regional level in the fields of service provision and advocacy.

ECCIL is the only recognized organization of European businesses in Laos. There are no bilateral chambers of EU member states. ECCIL cooperates closely with other chambers, is an active member of the World Wide European Business Organisations Network and founding member of the EU-ASEAN Business Council.
interests: Competition, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Information Society, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
ICI+ SEBSEAM goals. EU economic diplomacy, investigating opportunities under Partnership Programme.
We are member of the EBO WWN and the EU-ASEAN Business Council and contribute to their position papers.
As beneficiary for of the ICI+ Programme we are the prime entry point for European companies into the Lao market by providing support and information. We advocate for European business interests and promote inward investment.
